  • Constructor Details

    • Pokemon

      public Pokemon(int dexNumber, String name, PokemonType type1, PokemonType type2, int level, int baseHp, int baseAttack, int baseDefense, int baseSpecialAttack, int baseSpecialDefense, int baseSpeed, ArrayList<String> possibleAbilitiesString, String hiddenAbilityString, double height, double weight, int evolvesAt, Move[] moves, ArrayList<Move> learnSet)
      Method that creates Pokemon instance.
      Parameters:
      dexNumber - the pokemons pokedex number.
      name - the name of the pokemon.
      type1 - the first type of the pokemon.
      type2 - the second type of the pokemon if they have one.
      level - the pokemons level.
      baseHp - the pokemons base HP.
      baseAttack - the pokemons base attack.
      baseDefense - the pokemons base defense.
      baseSpecialAttack - the pokemons base special attack.
      baseSpecialDefense - the pokemons base special defense.
      baseSpeed - the pokemons base speed.
      possibleAbilitiesString - the pokemons list of possible abilities.
      hiddenAbilityString - the pokemons hidden ability.
      height - the pokemons height.
      weight - the pokemons weight.
      evolvesAt - the level the pokemon evolves at if it does.
      moves - the pokemons current learnt moves.
      learnSet - all the moves the pokemon can learn.

      Method that checks if a pokemon will have the STAB boost (Same Type Attack Bonus)
      Parameters:
      moveUsed - the move used.
      Returns:
      true if move used is the same as the pokemon type using it.

    • updateStatModifiers

      public void updateStatModifiers(int attackChange, int defenseChange, int spAttackChange, int spDefChange, int speedChange, int accuracyChange, int evasionChange)
      Method that updates a pokemons stats based on the change recieved as parameter.
      Parameters:
      attackChange - the attackChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.
      defenseChange - the defenseChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.
      spAttackChange - the spAttackChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.
      spDefChange - the spDefChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.
      speedChange - the speedChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.
      accuracyChange - the accuracyChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.
      evasionChange - the evasionChange to be implemented, 0 if should be unchanged.

      Method that adds an ailment to a pokemon.

    • checkAilments

      public boolean checkAilments(boolean beforeMove)
      Method that checks ailments and applies their effects.
      Parameters:
      beforeMove - this paramater defines if the ailments are ailments that are applied before a move, true to check ailments before a move is done.
      Returns:
      true if pokemon can attack, false if not.
